greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In the '3x+1' problem, take the sequence of starting values which set new records for the "dropping time" (A060412); sequence gives associated iterate where maximal value is reached in the trajectory with that start.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..35 (from the web page of Tomás Oliveira e Silva)
Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
